resources.string: type the info about the location
enter a phone number to send to

\ To send an information click "new message" then type the message and then click send, your location will be added automatically.\ Your message would be sent to the predefined phone number. Click on "sent messages" to see a list of all previously sent messages.

\ SMS Geographer is an application to facilitate tagging of locations on Google Maps with the use of a GPS enabled cell phone. Messages are sent over GSM-SMS thus reducing the amount of data sent over the network as compared to loading a full map then plotting the location. Some form of cartography you may call it.
